args.natural_language_statement: Prove that the one-point compactification of \mathbb{R}^{n} is homeomorphic to the unit sphere S^{n}.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Set Metric TopologicalSpace NNReal
open Topology

/-- Prove that the one-point compactification of \mathbb{R}^{n} is homeomorphic to the unit sphere S^{n}. -/
theorem homeomorphic_one_point_compactification_sphere (n : ℕ) :
    Homeomorph.onePoint ℝ^n = S^n := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Prove that the one-point compactification of ℝ^n is homeomorphic to the unit sphere S^n. -/
theorem homeomorphic_one_point_compactification_sphere (n : ℕ) :
    OnePointCompactification (Fin n → ℝ) ≃ₜ Sphere n := by sorry
